title: ETSI Domain Immersive + Reality Capture Crossover
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: etsi-domain-immersive-reality-capture-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20360
	- preferred-term:: ETSI Domain Immersive + Reality Capture Crossover
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Domain categorization marker indicating metaverse systems operating at the intersection of immersive interaction capabilities and reality capture technologies for photorealistic virtual environment creation.
	- source:: [[ETSI GR MEC 032]], [[ISO 23257]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:ETSIDomainImmersiveRealityCaptureMarker
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualObject
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[InteractionDomain]], [[CreativeMediaDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[ApplicationLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: etsi-domain-immersive-reality-capture-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Metaverse]]
		- is-part-of:: [[ETSI Metaverse Domain Model]]
		- requires:: [[ETSI Domain Immersive]]
		- requires:: [[ETSI Domain Reality Capture]]
		- enables:: [[Spatial Interaction]]
		- enables:: [[Volumetric Capture]]
		- enables:: [[Photorealistic Immersion]]

ontology.preferred_term: ETSI Domain Immersive + Reality Capture Crossover
ontology.definition: Domain categorization marker indicating metaverse systems operating at the intersection of immersive interaction capabilities and reality capture technologies for photorealistic virtual environment creation.
